description:
Sleek, modern hotel close to the Eiffel Tower

Tower power
Step outside the hip, recently renovated Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel in Paris's 15th arrondissement, and you'll be a 5-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. The neatly manicured Parc du Champ-de-Mars is a 10-minute walk.

Cross the Seine
For a fantastic Tower photo, walk 8 minutes west to Pont d'Ina and cross the Seine to Trocadro on the Right Bank. The photos from here are the ones you see on the postcard stands. A 15-minute walk east will put you at Les Invalides, final resting place of Napoleon.

405 freshly updated rooms
Freshly renovated, the 405-room hotel features 2 restaurants and a bar all with Eiffel Tower views. You can even spot the Tower from the 24-hour fitness center. Breakfast is offered in the caf or bar.

Art of design
Trendy, bang-up-to-date rooms feature either Eiffel Tower rooms or Eiffel motifs in their chic purple-silver decor. You'll have all the modern comforts you need, from free WiFi to mini-fridges.

DESCRIPTION.value:
Sleek, modern hotel close to the Eiffel Tower

Tower power
Step outside the hip, recently renovated Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel in Paris's 15th arrondissement, and you'll be a 5-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. The neatly manicured Parc du Champ-de-Mars is a 10-minute walk.

Cross the Seine
For a fantastic Tower photo, walk 8 minutes west to Pont d'Ina and cross the Seine to Trocadro on the Right Bank. The photos from here are the ones you see on the postcard stands. A 15-minute walk east will put you at Les Invalides, final resting place of Napoleon.

405 freshly updated rooms
Freshly renovated, the 405-room hotel features 2 restaurants and a bar all with Eiffel Tower views. You can even spot the Tower from the 24-hour fitness center. Breakfast is offered in the caf or bar.

Art of design
Trendy, bang-up-to-date rooms feature either Eiffel Tower rooms or Eiffel motifs in their chic purple-silver decor. You'll have all the modern comforts you need, from free WiFi to mini-fridges.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
Centrally located in Paris, France, the Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel hotel is less than a five-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower and the banks of the Seine. Arc de Triomphe is 2 km (1.3 mi) from the hotel; the Louvre is 3.2 km (2 mi) away.

The hotel serves a daily hot and cold breakfast buffet, and Eiffel Caf Restaurant features international cuisine and wines for lunch and dinner. The restaurant offers children's menus. Room service is available morning till late evening.

The hotel's 24-hour fitness center provides spectacular views of the Eiffel Tower. In addition, guests can find a fully-equipped sports facility and bicycle rentals nearby.


Business-related amenities at this 4-star hotel include audio-visual equipment, exhibit space, a computer station, and 6 small meeting rooms. Total event space is 4,842 square feet (450 square meters). High-speed wireless Internet access is complimentary in public areas.

Limo or town car service can be arranged for a surcharge and with reservations. Multilingual staff is happy to assist with concierge services. Guests can relax with drinks at the hotel bar or enjoy the scenery from the terrace.

The smoke-free Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel is a pet-friendly hotel.

DINING.value:
L'Eiffel Caf Restaurant - Serving international cuisine with views overlooking the garden. Open daily for lunch and dinner.

L'Eiffel Bar Lounge - Breakfast is served daily along with drinks and snacks throughout the day.

L'Eiffel Caf - Comfortable caf serving breakfast and lunch daily. Features a terrace that overlooks the garden.

RECREATION.value:
Recreational amenities at the hotel include a fitness facility.

The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or nearby; fees may apply.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

The preferred airport for Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel is Paris (ORY-Orly).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
2 miles from Louvre
Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel is less than a 5-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower and the Seine. The Louvre and Jardin du Luxembourg are both about 15 minutes by subway.

NATIONAL_RATING.value: This hotel has received its official star rating from the French Tourism Development Agency, ATOUT France.

KNOW_BEFORE_YOU_GO.value:
• A resort fee is included in the total price displayed.
  • Children 11 years old and younger stay free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Breakfast fee: EUR 19.90 per person (approximately)
  • Self parking fee: EUR 28 per day
  • Pet fee: EUR 25 per pet, per night
  • Rollaway bed fee: EUR 50 per night

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

MANDATORY_HOTEL_IMPOSED_FEES.value:

The charges below are included in your overall room price:

  • Resort fee

We have included all charges provided to us by the property. However, charges can vary, for example, based on length of stay or the room you book.

GOLD.value: Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel is a sleek, modern hotel just 5 minutes from the Eiffel Tower. The hotel's 405 rooms were completely renovated in early 2012, and guests enjoy free WiFi and wired internet. Two restaurants, a bar, and a fitness center have Eiffel Tower views. Kids 12 and under eat free at the hotel's breakfast buffet.

GUESTS_LOVE.value:
Guests Love
  • Proximity to the Eiffel Tower

  • Recent renovation makes for new, clean rooms with comfortable beds

  • Friendly, helpful staff

  • Tasty breakfast buffet where kids 12 and under eat for free

    • Keep in Mind
  • Some rooms face a sports field that can be noisy

  • Breakfast is a bit pricey

END_OF_THE_DAY.value:
At the end of the day
Our guests marvel at Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel's proximity to the Eiffel Tower. Guests love the newly renovated rooms, which feature free WiFi. While some find the breakfast buffet pricey, most rave about the food.

HOTEL_FEATURE.value:
• 405 smoke-free guestrooms
  • Restaurant and bar/lounge
  • Breakfast available
  • 24-hour fitness center
  • Self parking
  • Terrace
  • 24-hour front desk
  • Daily housekeeping
  • Garden
  • Computer station
  • Front desk safe
  • Snack bar/deli
  • Laundry service
  • Meeting rooms
  • Multilingual staff
  • Concierge services
  • Gift shops/newsstands
  • Free newspapers in the lobby
  • Luggage storage
  • Tour/ticket assistance
  • Porter/bellhop
  • TV in a common area

ROOM_FEATURE.value: You'll be in a fantastic location at Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel, just a 5-minute walk from Eiffel Tower and Champ de Mars. Guests can visit the 24-hour fitness center for a workout or grab a bite to eat at Eiffel Cafe Restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. A bar/lounge and a snack bar/deli are other highlights, and rooms at this upscale hotel offer minibars (stocked with some free items) and room service.

LOCATION_SECTION.value:
• Heart of Paris
  • Eiffel Tower (0.2 mi / 0.4 km)
  • Champ de Mars (0.2 mi / 0.4 km)
  • Arc de Triomphe (1.5 mi / 2.5 km)
  • Palais de Chaillot (0.9 mi / 1.4 km)
